QuestData.Title: A Cooling Trail
QuestData.Description:
<The amulet burns hot in your hand. The magic that runs through it tugs slightly at your grip.
Perhaps the enchantment spoken of by Bolvar can now be used to find Mograine.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Amulet of the Horsemen to find Darion Mograine.
QuestData.RewardText: <Darion is trapped within the cage. He appears unconscious.>
